title: Requires legislative approval of any contract between a corporation and New York state that would require the relocation of 75 or more employees across county lines
summary: Requires approval by the legislature and state comptroller of any contract between any private entity and the state which would require the relocation of 75 or more employees when those employees are state employees, private sector employees that perform a public function, or a combination thereof that perform a public function.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law and the state finance law, in relation to imposing certain contractual obligations upon the state
